players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob is dead. This is shocking. We need to figure out who did this. I don't have any special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and deductions."
Diana: "Bob's death is tragic, but we must stay calm and work together. Charlie, you said you have no abilities; Alice has been quiet so far. Alice, what are your thoughts?"
Charlie: "Diana, you're asking Alice for her thoughts, but you haven't shared any of your own. What did you observe about Bob, or what are your initial suspicions?"
You: "I have information that Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and can confirm this. We need to act quickly to arrest her before more harm is done."
Diana: "Diana is innocent, and Alice is lying to protect herself. Why would I admit to being mafia? Alice is trying to frame me because she fears suspicion."
